title: Calories in 1/2 Cup Strawberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 1/2 cup strawberries, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
assumptions: Fresh, sliced strawberries; no added sugar or toppings; standard serving size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by ripeness, variety, and preparation; values approximate. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1/2 cup sliced strawberries provides ~27 kcal and ~1.7 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: With 1 tbsp whipped cream per 1/2 cup

faqs.q: How many calories in 1/2 cup strawberries?
faqs.a: About 27 kcal for 1/2 cup sliced fresh strawberries.

faqs.q: What is the fiber content in 1/2 cup strawberries?

faqs.a: Yes, 1/2 cup has ~6.4 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

faqs.q: How much sugar in 1/2 cup strawberries?
Do strawberries have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Negligible fat (0.3 g) and 0 mg cholesterol per 1/2 cup.
